feedback: I loooooove this App! Since I found it, I can't remember a time when I bought a starbucks drink without it! The secret menu are insanely good and genuine! No hidden extra cost! You're the best!!!
Great app, I open and use almost every day to see amazing secret menu drinks. The secret menu recipes are always true to whats advertised. Have recommended to many of my friends!

I NEVER, EVER write reviews for apps but for this one, I felt needed to. This app is such pleasure to use. So smooth and intuitive. I've used all of secret menu drinks and all of them are to good in taste
